item.title: The Okr
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is OKR OKR (Object and Key Result) is a management methodology, an outcome-driven tracking framework. Object : is a goal we want to achieve **Key Results : **are a set of explaination for how will we know we are getting there. For example In Q1/2018 DF’s objective is want to build a strong backend team, so “**build a strong backend team” **is an object, to accomplish that, we will hire 2 senior backend developers and **organize 1 training session per week, **each of them is a key result to let us know whether we are getting to our objective or not.
